title: Add App Market listing and sharing support

requirements.text: Add an in-app section that helps the user list the TikTok → YouTube Converter app in the Caffeine App Market, including clear step-by-step instructions and a prominent call-to-action that opens caffeine.ai in a new tab for completing the listing.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user views the listing section, they see step-by-step instructions written in English for listing the app in the Caffeine App Market.
A CTA button/link is present and opens https://caffeine.ai/ in a new tab (noopener noreferrer).
The listing section is reachable from the main app UI without requiring authentication.

requirements.text: Add sharing utilities to make the live app easy to distribute: show the current app URL, provide a one-click 'Copy link' action, and replace the footer social icons’ placeholder (#) hrefs with real share-intent URLs that share the current app URL.
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Copy link' control copies window.location.href and provides visible success feedback.
Footer social icons no longer use href="#" and instead open share-intent URLs in a new tab with the app URL prefilled.
All generated share URLs correctly URL-encode the app URL.
No social-media API integrations are used (only standard share-intent links).

requirements.text: Update app metadata/content where appropriate so the app presents well for an App Market audience: ensure the app name and a short description are consistently presented in the header/hero/footer and can be reused in the new listing section.
acceptanceCriteria: The app name and a short one-sentence description are displayed consistently and reused in the listing section without duplicating conflicting copy.
All user-facing text is in English.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
No third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; only add migration.mo if state schema must change.
nonGoals: Implementing actual automated submission/listing to the Caffeine App Market via an API (provide guidance and outbound link only).
Implementing monetization, payments, or airdrop logic inside the app.
Adding social-media API integrations (use share-intent links only).
